body_html: @myleott I think the results on CPU meets the defination of triu (upper triangular part of the matrix). It is really hard to handle with a tensor from expand operation with multi-thread not only on GPU but also on CPU. @fmassa, The unexpected result will also happen on CPU if we apply openmp to it. I think it is necessary to eleminate the difference between the implementation and defination.
